name: 失眠诊所
description:
"The Insomnia Clinic" is a text-based interactive game that progresses through its storyline. When necessary, players need to interact with the elements in the visuals to trigger events.

The game is set in an animal town where, overnight, a mysterious insomnia clinic opens. They claim to have unique methods to treat insomnia.

Game Features:

Adorable illustrations
Captivating music
Three thought-provoking stories

We aim to bring some warmth to players in this fast-paced society.
developers: 幻想理戈游戏开发工作室
publishers: 幻想理戈游戏开发工作室
